Pre-Game Insights: Scotland's head coach Steve Clarke instilled in his team the mantra'respect everyone and fear no one'
Scotland captain Andy Robertson thanked the Tartan Army for their support
Miscellaneous Highlights: A good first match and group stage could set off a new wave of excitement in Germany
Germany captain İlkay Gündoğan believes a convincing start could change the picture
Others: Scotland has won only one of its last 13 matches against Germany, which was more than 25 years ago
Germany went out at the group stage of both the previous World Cups and was eliminated by England in the round of 16 at Euro 2020
